Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at 69th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
